name: mdgce
displayName: SAP Master Data Governance, cloud edition
description: SAP Master Data Governance, cloud edition

links.text: SAP Discovery Center - Master Data Governance, cloud edition
Deep-Dive: Detailed Presentation on SAP Master Data Governance, cloud edition

servicePlans.name: demo
servicePlans.description: Process core business partner master data (such as name and address) using multi-level, workflow-based change processes, and evaluate their quality. This plan is for test and demo purposes. No productive use is permitted.

servicePlans.name: free
servicePlans.description: Process core business partner master data (such as name and address) using multi-level, workflow-based change processes, and evaluate their quality. This plan is for test and free purposes. No productive use is permitted. Please note, only community support is available for free service plans and these are not subject to SLAs. Use of free tier service plans are subject to additional terms and conditions as provided in the Business Technology Platform Supplemental Terms and Conditions linked in the Additional Links tab displayed in the Service tile. Up to 5000 business partner master data records in active data and up to 10000 businesspartners in open processes.

servicePlans.name: standard
servicePlans.description: This plan is for productive usage. The metered number of records is considered for license calculation.

servicePlans.name: test
servicePlans.description: This plan is for test purposes. No productive use is permitted. The metered number of records is considered for license calculation if it exceeds the usage with plan standard.
